definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
(of a price) to fluctuate according to the market/to sell at the market price

sentences.english: This form is to be completed in English and Chinese by non-travelling parents of minors under 18 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 此表格由十八歲以下申請人的不隨行父母填寫。

sentences.english: Cissokho's entourage are also in Milan and they are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 西索霍的隨行人員也一直米蘭，他們對此憂心忡忡。

sentences.english: A chef who was traveling with the group was also hurt, so everyone started cooking, Mr. Dhao said.
sentences.chinese: 隨行而來的廚師也受了傷，所以每個人都成了廚子。

sentences.english: He discover two same, so he ask retinue .
sentences.chinese: 他發現兩個相同的，所以他要求隨行人員。

sentences.english: The idea is to compact distances between lead and following cars.
sentences.chinese: 其實就是要縮短領頭車和隨行車輛的距離。

sentences.english: This system is a friction-free alternative to trailing cables, such as with high-bay stackers.
sentences.chinese: 該系統無摩擦，是替隨行電纜的良好替代品。

sentences.english: The party entered holy Benares by boat along the Ganges .
sentences.chinese: 隨行人員乘小舟延着恆河進入神聖的貝拿勒斯。

sentences.english: On this splendid season, let dazzle colour with you all the way accompanying.
sentences.chinese: 在這個燦爛的季節，讓炫彩伴你一路隨行。

sentences.english: The images moonlight, frost, moon are much more than arbitrary symbols.
sentences.chinese: 月光，白霜，明月的意象，比象徵更加隨行。

sentences.english: A number of experienced staff went with the students on both Shanghai and Beijing trips.
sentences.chinese: 隨行的還包括我校幾位有豐富面試經驗的教職工。

sentences.english: An example of an advanced body signal is seen during heeling.
sentences.chinese: 一個高級身體信號的例子就是隨行訓練中的目光。

sentences.english: Scientists also went with their experiments, engineers with their screwdrivers.
sentences.chinese: 科學家和工程師也會各自帶着實驗設備和螺絲刀隨行。

sentences.english: Market regulations of foreign exchange quotas and cash remittances are permitted, and prices are e changeable according t changes of the market.
sentences.chinese: 允許外匯額度和現匯進行市場調節，價格隨行就市。

sentences.english: Peasants now sell vegetables at moving prices determined by their supply and their customer's demand.
sentences.chinese: 現在農民出售蔬菜，價格都是隨行就市。

sentences.english: Within a year, he had acquired several oceangoing vessels.
sentences.chinese: 一年之內，他吸引“捕獲”了好幾艘遠洋航行船隨行。

sentences.english: Another path bit golden couple also accompanying.
sentences.chinese: 另外程咬金夫婦亦隨行。

to be present/to be on the scene
